info.name: Lapstore API
info.description:
API collection for the Lapstore backend application. 

**Setup:**
1. Create a Postman Environment.
2. Add a variable `baseUrl` (e.g., `http://localhost:8080`).
3. Other variables like `userToken`, `adminToken`, `userId`, `productId`, `orderId`, `addressId`, `categoryId`, `brandId`, `cartItemId`, `orderNumber`, `productSlug`, `categorySlug`, `brandSlug`, `imageFilename` will be used. Some (like tokens) are set by login requests.
